GSP29vnyps51u:2: nyā. pa. prame. 1 evaṃ saparikaraṃ pramāṇaṃ viśodhitam /
GSP29vnyps51u:4: tatra yat punaḥ ṣaṭsaptādirūpeṇa padārthān vibhajya vaiśeṣikādayaścintayanti,
GSP29vnyps51u:15: yadapi ca--- dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyarūpeṇa bhāvarūpāṇāṃ padārthānāṃ ṣoḍhā parisaṃkhyānam,
GSP29vnyps51u:16: tadapi vaiśeṣikādhikaraṇe “samavāyābhyupagamācca sāmyādanavasthiteḥ” iti sūtrakāraireva samavāyākhyapadārthāntaradūśaṇena parāstam /
GSP29vnyps51u:18: yaścānyonyamatyantatulyeṣu muktātmādiṣu mitho vyāvṛttadhījananāya dravyatvādihetunā viśeṣākhyaḥ padārthaḥ kalpyate,
GSP29vnyps51u:21: api cānityeṣu dravyeṣu tāvajjātiguṇapādibhireva vyāvṛttadhīḥ sidhyatīti nityeṣu hi viśeṣonyaḥ kalpyate;
GSP29vnyps51u:30: tadatyantasāmyavatsu mukteṣu nityeṣvapi hi tatsāmyasyaiva saṃrakṣaṇāya dharmigrāhakasiddhā yāvadātmabhāvinaste te viśeṣā na parityaktāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:31: na ceśvaradvaitam; yeneśvarāṇāṃ mithovyāvṛttapratītyai viśeṣaṃ kalpayiṣyāmaḥ,
GSP29vnyps51u:33: asyaiva ca sāmānyaśabdairviśeṣaśabdaiśca rūḍhito yogatastattadvasatuviśiṣṭatvādinā ca tattatprakaraṇānuguṇaṃ śarīrake pratipādyatvasthāpanāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:37: muktadaśāyāṃ nityebhyaḥ kiṃ vaiṣmyamiti cet, kiṃ tena ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:39: siddhairapi tadvyavahāre prāktanopādhibhedaireva tattatpramāṇapramitaiḥ pratisaṃhitaiḥ sarvanirvāhāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:43: tadatadvibhāgo hi tatkālavartinaivaṃ dharmeṇeti na niyamaḥ,
GSP29vnyps51u:49: teṣāmapi hi satyasaṃkalpānāṃ vicitrāḥ saṃkalpecchādaya riśvarasyevāniyatadeśakālaviṣayāparyanuyojyasāmagrīkā anādyanantasaṃtānavantaḥ santīti kimanyena viśeṣeṇa ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:50: api ca yaddarśane yatra yadāropo na bhavati sa hi tasya tato bhedaḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:52: sa cet svarūpabhūtohantvamādirūpeṇa bhātaḥ parāropaṃ pratirundhyāt, kastatonyastato viśeṣastasya ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:54: svaparanirvāhakāste viśeṣāḥ, iti cet, kiṃ ta eva? /
GSP29vnyps51u:55: api ca pṛthaktve vidyamāne kiṃ tairviśeṣaiḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:56: pṛthaktvasyaikajātisaṃgṛhītatvānna tatopi vyāvṛttadhīrīti cet, tarhi tato na kvacidapi syāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:58: viśeṣatvaṃ nāma jātirnāstīti cet, kiṃ tat ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:59: upādhiriticet, kiṃ tato na saṃgrahaḥ?, tathā sati kvacidapi tannibandhanānuvṛttadhībhaṅgaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:63_0: na punaḥ parābhimatamavayavyākhyaṃ dravyamastīti samarthanād ghaṭādyavayavyabhāve
GSP29vnyps51u:65: tat parairapi kāryatayābhyupetamupalambhādibhiśca tathaiva sidhyatīti na tatrāpi nityatvakalpanāvakāśaḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:66: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ dravyāṇāṃ svarūpatonādyanantatvāt kāryadravyatvātmatvādimātrameva śiṣyate /
GSP29vnyps51u:71: saṃsthānaṃ nāma svāsādhāraṇaṃ rūpamiti yathāvastu saṃsthānamanusaṃdheyam” iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:75: anyathāsiddheḥ; atiriktasāmānyamabhyupagacchatopi hi tadupalakṣaṇaṃ saṃsthānamiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca /
GSP29vnyps51u:81: tavāpi vā tatra sāmānyamupalakṣaṇena saṃgṛhyate, na vā ?
GSP29vnyps51u:84: vyāvṛttānāmapi svabhāvata eva kāsāṃcit vyaktīnāṃ tadvyañjakatvaniyatiriti cet,
GSP29vnyps51u:85: sa eva svabhāvaḥ kiṃ na vyavahāraṃ niyachet /
GSP29vnyps51u:86: nirviṣayaḥ kathaṃ vyavahāraḥ syāditi cet, tāsāmeva vyaktīnāṃ viṣayatvāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:88: vyāvṛttānāmanuvṛttavyañjakatve sarvatra tadvyaktiḥ kiṃ na syāt ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:92: tathāpi dṛṣṭaikagovyaktervyaktyantare soyamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ kathaṃ syāt ?
GSP29vnyps51u:93: ayaṃ gaurityekavyaktau vyutpāditaśca kathaṃ vyaktyatyantarepi tacchabdavācyatāṃ pratīyāt ?
GSP29vnyps51u:96: tenaiva dharmeṇa svato militasya samavāyasyaiva nityaṃ sarvatra vṛttyabhyupagamena sarvatra sarvavyavahārasaṃkaraprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:99: tathā sati bhrāntatvaṃ tayoḥ syāditi cenna,
GSP29vnyps51u:101: api tarhi tathātvena vyaktisvarūpātiriktaṃ tathātvaṃ nāmāntareṇa jātireva syāditi cet,
GSP29vnyps51u:102: tajjātivyañjakaṃ tattadekavyaktisvarūpātiriktaṃ kiṃ na jātyantaraṃ syāt ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:104: evaṃ tarhi pratiniyatapratiyogikaṃ svabhāvaniyataṃ parasparasmārakatvamupajīvya tajjātīyatayā pratisaṃdhānavyavahāropapattau kimanyakalpanena ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:105: tasmārakataditaravibhāgaḥ kutastya iti cet, tadvyañjakataditaravibhāgaste kutastyaḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:107: saṃbandhasādṛśyayorabhāve kathaṃ smārakatvamiti cet, tayorvā katham ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:111: anyathā saṃbandhaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vaikamupādāya tadanyasya kathaṃ smārakatvamiti codyasya durvāratvāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:112: na cātra sādṛśyaṃ nāṅgīkurmaḥ, sausādṛśyarūpatvābhyupagamāt sāmānyasya /
GSP29vnyps51u:117: evaṃ sāmānyādiṣu sūtrakārādibhirnirasteṣu pariśiṣṭā dravyaguṇakarmarūpāstrayaḥ padārthāḥ iti kecidācāryāḥ //
GSP29vnyps51u:118: nyā. pa. prame. 2 anye tu manyante---yathā tatpratīteranyathāsiddhatayā te padārthā bhāṣyakārādibhirnirasyante,
GSP29vnyps51u:121: ye tāvadiha sarvatra sūryaparispandādivadapratyakṣaṃ karma phalānumeyamicchanti /
GSP29vnyps51u:122: tatra yayā sāmagryā karmaṇaḥ siddhirabhimatā tayaiva dṛṣṭaṃ karmaphalaṃ sādhyatām,
GSP29vnyps51u:128: tairapi nūnaṃ karmaphalatvenābhyupagamasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktaṃ nipuṇanirīkṣaṇepi nopalabhyata iti manyāmahe /
GSP29vnyps51u:130: na ca vācyaṃ yāvatsaṃyogaṃ calatipratyayaprasaṅga iti,
GSP29vnyps51u:132: tata eva hyuttarakāle saṃyoge vartamānepyacaladiti bhūtānusaṃdhānamupapannam /
GSP29vnyps51u:133: nanu pravāhamadhyasthite sthāṇau pūrvasalilaskandhaviyogaḥ uttarasalilaskandhayogaśca dṛśyate,
GSP29vnyps51u:134: na ca tatra calatvamicchāmaḥ; vyomādaya eva sthiradeśatvena vivakṣitāḥ iti cenna,
GSP29vnyps51u:135: pravāhasya tato viśeṣādarśanāt; laulyam viśeṣaḥ iti cet,
GSP29vnyps51u:136: tarhi saṃyogavibhāgātiriktaṃ laulyarūpaṃ karmapratyakṣamiti kathaṃ tadapahnavaḥ ? iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:137: tatrāhuḥ---yā nāma karmasāmagrī tvayeṣyate sā tattatkarmaphalatayābhimataṃ saṃyogaviśeṣamutpādayantī niyatasvabhāvameva tamutpādayati /
GSP29vnyps51u:138: ata eva eva saṃyogonekaniṣṭhopi san kvaciccalatipratyaṃyaṃ kvacit saṃyogamātrapratyayaṃ ca janayati,
GSP29vnyps51u:139: yathaika eva samavāyoguṇaguṇibhyāmaviśeṣeṇa svato militopi san kvacidāśrayapratyayaṃ kvacidāśritapratyayaṃ ca janayati,
GSP29vnyps51u:140: na hyāśrayabhāva āśritabhāvo vā samavāyasvarūpātiriktaḥ, tadvadihāpīti /
GSP29vnyps51u:144: idaṃ tu manyāmahe--- atirekepi guṇavargānna rāśyantaraṃ karma,
GSP29vnyps51u:146: svecchākalpitavibhājakasya sarvatra sulabhatvena yathābhimatamekaṃ guṇamubhayaṃ vāṅgīkṛtya rāśyantarakalpanaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29vnyps51u:149: nyā. pa. prame. 3 tatra cātmaguṇatayābhimateṣu sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāḥ pañca tattadutpādakatayābhimatabuddhiviśeṣānatiriktā vedārthasaṃgrahe samarthitāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:150: dharmādharmau vihitaniṣiddhakriyāsādhyatayābhimatāvājñāvato rājña iva sarvapraśāsiturīśvarasyānugrahanigrahākhyabuddhiviśeṣarūpau bhāṣyādiṣu bahuṣu pradeśeṣu prapañcitau /
GSP29vnyps51u:154: nyā. pa. prame. 4 yadyapi “indriyasyendriyasyārthe” ityādigītāślokeṣu bhāṣyakārairvāsanāyā icchādvāreṇaiva pravṛttihetutvavacanājjñānavāsanāviśeṣātiriktā karmavāsanā nāsti,
GSP29vnyps51u:157: tatra dharmabhūtajñānasya dravyatvaṃnyāyatattvātmasiddhibhāśyādisiddhamanusaratāṃ tanniṣṭhasmṛtyākhyavikārotpādakaḥ saṃskāro 'pi tanniṣṭhaḥ prāptaḥ;
GSP29vnyps51u:159: nyā. pa. prame. 5 ye tu paraparibhāṣamanusarantastadanuguṇaṃ tasya guṇatvaṃ gṛhṇanti,
GSP29vnyps51u:161: na ca buddhornityatvaṃ saṃkocavikāsādidaśābhedaṃ cābhyupagacchadbhiradravyatvaṃ tasyāḥ suvacam;
GSP29vnyps51u:171: ato jñānaṃ dravyam, tadavasthāviśeṣāstvadravyāṇīti saṃskārākhyavikārāsthitirapi tatraiva yuktā /
GSP29vnyps51u:172: vegākhyastu saṃskārastadutpādakatvābhimatakarmaviśaiṣātirikto na dṛśyate, na ca yujyate /
GSP29vnyps51u:173: sthitasthāpakau tu karmanivṛttāvapi tadavinābhūtasaṃyogaviśeṣatvaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam //
GSP29vnyps51u:174: nyā. pa. prame. 6 ye ca bhagavatonantā maṅgalaguṇāḥ prakīrtyante,
GSP29vnyps51u:180: aiśvaryaṃ niyamanaśaktiḥ; vikārahetuṣvapyavikṛtatvaṃ vīryam; tejaḥ parābhibhavanasāmarthyam,
GSP29vnyps51u:187: śaktiviśeṣastu jñānaṃ syāditi cet, kosau śaktiśabdārthaḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:188: vilakṣaṇo guṇaviśeṣaḥ prabhākarādinayena padārthāntaraṃ vā iti cet,
GSP29vnyps51u:199: sā cedupādānaṃ, sūkṣmandravyamevāsau syāditi na vivādaḥ //
GSP29vnyps51u:200: nyā. pa. prame. 7 athāciddravyaviśeṣaguṇān paśyāmaḥ--- tatra śabdādayaḥ pañca tattadbhūtavartinaḥ pratyakṣādibalādabhyupagatāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:203: nairantaryamātramevāyamiti cet, tat kiṃ dravyasvarūpam, utāganturavasthāviśeṣaḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps51u:209: tatkalpane ca prāktvapratyaktvādayopi hi bahavo guṇāstulyanyāyāḥ kalpyāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:212: nyā. pa. prame. 8 atha dravyāṇi vimṛśyante--- tatra tāvat kaumārilābhimatavibhuśabdākhyadravyavādaḥ śabdasyācidavasthāviśeṣatvena śrutyādisiddhatvānnirākāryaḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:218: tathā hyuktaṃ varadagurubhistattvasāre--- “tamo nāma dravyaṃ bahulaviralaṃ mecakacalaṃ pratīmaḥ kenāpi kvacidapi na bādhaśca dadṛśe /
GSP29vnyps51u:219: ataḥ kalpyo hetuḥ pramitirapi śābdī vijayate nirālokaṃ cakṣuḥ prathayati hi tad darśanavaśāt” //
GSP29vnyps51u:221: etena viyati vitatānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ pṛthivyavayavānāṃ kṛṣṇo guṇastama iti pakṣopi pratikṣiptaḥ;
GSP29vnyps51u:224: sparśarūparasānāṃ ca śabdagandhavad bhrāntau pramitau vā nirādhāragrahaṇādarśanācca--iti /
GSP29vnyps51u:225: evaṃ dravyatve siddhe kṛṣṇavarṇasya dravyasya pṛthivītvamevābhyupagantumucitam,
GSP29vnyps51u:228: nānyatra pākādapi bhavati; ākāśādiṣu nailyopalambhopi hi pañcīkaraṇamūlapṛthivīsaṃsargāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:230: nanvevamākāśameva dravyāntarasaṃsargānnīlaṃ tama ityupalabhyate iti syāditi cet,
GSP29vnyps51u:239: divābhītānāṃ viśiṣṭāñjanarañjitākṣāṇāṃ cālokanirapekṣameva cakṣuṣaiva padārthā gṛhyante /
GSP29vnyps51u:243: pṛthivyādīni pañca bhūtāni manaśca triguṇadravyapariṇativiśeṣatayā śrutyādisiddhatvānna pṛthagdravyāṇi /
GSP29vnyps51u:244: tatra cāvayavyākhyaṃ bhautikadravyam “tadananyatvamārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ” ityādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sūtrairbuddhiśabdāntarāderanyathāsiddhyādyupapādanena nirastam /
GSP29vnyps51u:252: na caivaṃ kālepi prasaṅgaḥ, nityasya kālasya bhagavatparāśarādibhiḥ pṛthakprasaṃkhyānāt /
GSP29vnyps51u:256: tasya hi cetanatvādibhiḥ saṃgrahasaṃbhavepyavāntaravailakṣaṇyajñāpanāya pṛthaksaṃkhyānaṃ prācāmanādivācāṃ ca,
GSP29vnyps51u:258: viviktaṃ ca bhagavatā parāśareṇa--- “paramātmātmanoryogaḥ paramārtha itīṣyate /
GSP29vnyps51u:265: bhoktṛbhogyaniyantṝṇāṃ sadātmanaikadravyatvādipakṣā api nirviśeṣasanmātrapakṣavad vyāghātaśrutivirodhādibhirbahuśo bhāṣyādiṣu nirastāḥ /
GSP29vnyps51u:273: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau prameyādhyāye prathamamāhnikam //
